channel.title: Benchmarking high-dimensional Bayesian Optimization of discrete sequences on Benchmarking HDBO
channel.description: Recent content in Benchmarking high-dimensional Bayesian Optimization of discrete sequences on Benchmarking HDBO

item.title: Benchmarking HDBO
item.description: Abstract Optimizing discrete black-box functions is key in several domains, ranging from protein engineering to drug design. Due to the lack of gradient information and the need for sample efficiency, Bayesian optimization is an ideal candidate for these tasks.

item.title: A review of high-dimensional Bayesian optimization
item.description: We have collected a list of high-dimensional Bayesian optimization methods and their implementations (at least those that we could find) in the following table.

item.title: Benchmarks
item.description: We test several HDBO methods in the PMO benchmark using the tools provided by the Therapeutics Data Commons. In future work we plan to incorporate objective functions involving protein engineering and other high-dimensional discrete optimization tasks.
